attributes.action: Ban Martin Taylor From Football For Life
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Martin Taylor is the footballer who broke Eduado da Silvas leg on saturday 23rd of feburary 2008. we think he should never be allowed to play football again!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
